content: I'm excited to share more about my piece. I want to create a dreamlike scene with a figure floating in a misty, ethereal environment. I'm thinking of using soft, pastel colors to evoke a sense of calmness and serenity. I'd like to experiment with layering and blending techniques to achieve a sense of depth and atmosphere. Do you have any tips on how to create a sense of mistiness or fog in my artwork?
